name: Gloam Chorant
description: A prophet of rot in motion, the Gloam Chorant spreads the Choir's will not through sermons, but through the arc of his weapon. With each blow, he plants sacred decay, a walking hymn that splits the earth and opens flesh to bloom.
abilities: Rootshaper (Free Action): This model may move one Bloom Marker within 6" up to 6" in any direction.
Sow the Grave (Action): Place a Bloom Marker within 6" of this model.

Fungal Maw (Action): Target two Bloom Markers within 6" of this model. Place a Fungal Maw unit so that its base is as close as possible to both targeted Bloom Markers. Remove the targeted Bloom Markers from the board.
